question: Match the following:
columnA: Members having cell walls excluded from Plantae
columnB: Algae, Bryophytes, Pteridophytes, Gymnosperms and Angiosperms

answer.Groups described under Plantae: Algae, Bryophytes, Pteridophytes, Gymnosperms and Angiosperms

question: Match the following:
columnA: Classification given by George Bentham and Joseph Dalton Hooker
columnB: Used only gross superficial morphological characters
Based on natural affinities among the organisms
Based mainly on vegetative characters or on the androecium structure
Gave equal weightage to vegetative and sexual characteristics

answer.Earliest systems of classification: Used only gross superficial morphological characters
answer.System given by Linnaeus: Based mainly on vegetative characters or on the androecium structure
answer.Basis of artificial systems: Gave equal weightage to vegetative and sexual characteristics
answer.Natural classification systems: Based on natural affinities among the organisms
